content: ________ this will be the length of the short row heel example short row heel length is 2 for my sock closer to 2 25 or 2 5 for a man sized sock continue to work foot as follows knit every round until you have reached desired finished length of foot short row heel length = _________ example of my women sized sock desired finished length of foot see first page is 9 short row heel length is 2 knit every round until sock measures 9 2 = 7 measured from tip of toe to needle short row heel suggestions shadow wrap heel german short row heel double wrap short row heel work the short row heel on half the stitches bottom of foot stitches as follows work the short row shorter and shorter down to the number of stitches for centre toe cast on _____ number of stitches then work short row longer and longer to the end of the heel example worked short row heel on 30 sts working short row down to 10 sts centre toe cast on number of stitches and then back up to 30 sts leg work leg as you wish plain or with a pattern work some ribbing if you wish cast off here s a cast off i used cast off in rib pattern as follows if the next stitch is a knit stitch knit it and cast off as usual if the next stitch is a purl work a yarn over and then the purl stitch cast off both yarn over and previous stitch on right needle repeat modification i find i like a little more room around the heel so i worked a gusset work the toe and foot as above until the foot is 1 less than the length of foot to start the heel example length to short row heel is 7 for my sock i started the gusset when my sock measured 6 from tip of toe work the gusset top of foot k2 work increase knit to last 2 sts for top of foot work increase k2 knit across bottom of foot knit 1 round repeat last 2 rounds until you have reached the length of foot to begin the short row heel work short row heel over the bottom of foot stitches decrease the gusset down to original number of stitches as follows top of foot k1 ssk knit to last 3 sts on top of foot k2tog k1 knit across bottom of foot knit 1 round repeat last 2 rounds to original number of stitches
